translation: 31. Verily, for the Muttaqûn,[1] there will be a success (Paradise);
footnotes: (V.78:31) Muttaqûn: means pious believer of Islamic Monotheism who fear Allâh much (abstain from all kinds of sins and evil deeds which He has forbidden) and love Allâh much (perform all kinds of good deeds which He has ordained).
